metadata.title: Russian Time-series Observation around the Sakhalin Island

creators.name: Sakhalin Research Institute of Fisheries & Oceanography (SakhNIRO)

metadata.description:
Hydrographic time-series data around the Sakhalin Island.  The principal area of monitoring covers waters in a 100-mile zone around Sakhalin Island in the Okhotsk Sea and Tatar Strait.  

[ Reference: PICES Scientific Report No. 18 2001, Proceedings of the PICES/CoML/IPRC Workshop on "Impact of Climate Variability on Observation and Prediction of Ecosystem and Biodiversity Changes in the North Pacific", http://www.pices.int/publications/scientific_reports/Report18/default.aspx. ]
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To understand the waters around the Sakhalin Island.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: Contact Source
